summary: Discussion focused on how to handle direct deals in Salesforce, particularly those involving Fernando who works for Maxim but sometimes acts as a referral source. The team discussed validation rules and proper way to structure deal intake automation when there is no broker involved.
decisions: Direct deals should skip broker section in intake process
Fernando doesn't need to be referral source contact for direct deals
action_items: Laura to review validation rules structure
Need to determine best practice for differentiating direct customer applications in Salesforce
concerns: Current validation rules preventing deals without brokers
Potential long-term data issues from current workarounds
System not built for direct deals
michael_priorities: Wants flexibility to enter deals without brokers
Needs clear way to tag Maxim source leads/accounts/opportunities
Emphasized this is a priority level 3 issue
commitments: Laura will handle any additional overage bills through end of October
Laura will investigate proper restructuring of deal intake automation
